definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The analysis of on-job training investment on the base of mathematics.

sentences.english: The students in a topology course should have some knowledge of mathematical analysis and abstract algebra .

sentences.english: After mathematical analysis we have elucidated the serious consequences resulted from misusing .

sentences.english: This article discusses the analyzing nature of Dirichlet function and Riemann function .

sentences.english: It can be said that mathematical analysis is infinitesimal analysis.
sentences.chinese: 可以說，數學分析就是無窮小分析。

sentences.english: Extreme function analysis of the mathematical method is the important component.
